title: The Lifestyle (2009) DVDRip
description:
Stormy Daniels, Adrianna Nicole, Carolyn Reese, Jayme Langford, Kaylani Lei, Mackenzee Pierce, Nicole Sheridan, Roxy Deville, Roxy Jezel, Tori Black, Alan Stafford, Evan Stone, Randy Spears, Sascha, Tony de Sergio, Voodoo

 
Desperate to save their fizzled marriage, Allison (Stormy Daniels) and her
husband Rick decide to try all kinds of inventive ways to return the spark
to their sex life. None of the tactics have the outcome they are hoping
for... some result in hilarious mishaps and even injury. Their best friends
Jackie (Kaylani Lei) and Chris, however, cannot keep their hands off of each
other. Finally, Allison seeks the advice of her friend and learns the secret
of their idyllic relationship is their involvement with the 'lifestyle'. Things
get even more humorous when Allison and Rick are invited to a 'get together'
with other members of the lifestyle and the couple find themselves unknowingly
smack in the middle of a swingers' party. Will this be just what they need or
will it be the final step towards divorce court.

Video: 656x496 (1.32:1), 23.976 fps, XviD MPEG-4 ~1862 kbps avg, 0.24 bit/pixel
Audio: 48 kHz, AC3 Dolby Digital, 3/2 (L,C,R,l,r) + LFE ch, ~384.00 kbps avg
